comment.author: 38123137@N00
comment._content: Fun venue! -- "DREAM A GREEN-SCENE FOR EACH WASTE SPACE!" Imagine fully re-green cities!!! Tree avenues, big potted plants, floral median-strips, street-lamps with hanging flower baskets!! Join the celebrations ~ Our Green preparations. Add me as friend! Invite civic bodies, park venues, etc. if you wish. WILLIAM PHILLIPS [1825-1911] ECO-CENTENARY 2011 ~ UK-IRELAND-ITALY, &C -- AWARD Help Celebrate his 2011 ECO-CENTENARY FESTIVAL at CULTURAL HALLS, **PARK GAZEBOS, or CONCERT BANDSTANDS** >
